Mouse Hypothalamus MERFISH data

Source: R/data.R
hypothalamus.Rd

This dataset comprises MERFISH profiling of cells in the pre-optic region of the mouse hypothalamus (Moffitt et al. (2018), Molecular, spatial, and functional single-cell profiling of the hypothalamic preoptic region. doi: 10.1126/science.aau5324). The data is subset to 2 z-planes from a single animal (Animal 1, bregmas 0.21 and 0.26). Gene expression, cell centroids and metadata for 11,162 cells and 161 genes in 3 spatial dimensions are provided.

data(hypothalamus)

Format

A list with 3 entries:

expression

(matrix) gene expression matrix

locations

(data.frame) cell centroids in 3D

metadata

(data.frame) metadata for cells, including cell class, neuronal cluster, animal ID, behavioral class

Source

https://datadryad.org/stash/dataset/doi:10.5061/dryad.8t8s248
